jobTitle: System Architecture and Performance Modeling Engineer
jobDescription: Req. ID: 118792     Micron Technology’s Inc., vision is to transform how the world uses information to enrich life and our commitment to people, innovation, tenacity, collaboration, and customer focus allows us to fulfill our mission to be a global leader in memory and storage solutions. This means conducting business with integrity, accountability, and professionalism while supporting our global community.    As a System Architecture and Performance Modeling Engineerat Micron, you will work with the memory industry’s leading architecture team on new concepts which will shape the future of electronic systems. Site Location for this role is flexible.   Responsibilities include, but not limited to:   Performing open- and closed-loop system performance analysis of new advanced memory architectures in comparison with existing paradigmsCreating or modify and tune processor micro-architectures tuned to selected process technology nodesWorking with internal engineering teams and external customers to optimize and characterize new memory and or processing components, functions, and architectures Activities entail choosing the appropriate simulation tools/environment; constructing or modifying component models including memory devices, controllers, processors; verification, generating or acquiring relevant workloads; constructing performance monitoring means (e.g. energy, cycles, statistics gathering, etc.); controller/strategy optimization; recommendationsScope spans from component-level to full system-level modeling, analysis and benchmarking and designing and tuning micro-architectures which interact with memory and or processing elements   Qualifications include, but not limited to:   A Master’s or PhD (Preferred) in Electrical Engineering in computer architecture or closely related subjects and 10+ years of relevant industry experienceDemonstrated capability in performance modeling and familiarity, experience using a variety of available tools, demonstrated capability in processor micro-architectureStrong knowledge of DRAM and NAND memory systemsKnowledge of other memory types is an asset. Strong knowledge of error-correction and mitigation methodsStrong knowledge of various processor micro-architectures. Understanding of operating systems and hypervisorsExcellent problem solving and troubleshooting skillsExcellent verbal communication and written skillsSolid programming language and computer skillsMust be open-minded and creativeHighly organized and self-motivated   About Us   As the leader in innovative memory solutions, Micron is helping the world make sense of data by delivering technology that is transforming how the world uses information.
